idea-plugin.name: Eclipser
idea-plugin.description:
Eclipser converts Eclipse launch configurations into IntelliJ IDEA configurations:
  • Local Java application Eclipse launcher will be converted into Application run configuration
  • Program launch Eclipse launcher will be converted into external tool in Tools menu
  • Maven launch configuration will be converted into Maven run configuration[experimental]
For limitations, known issues and support please refer to plugin wiki: https://github.com/kukido/eclipser/wiki
